text: Bank and Financial Institutions Division () is a Bangladesh government division under the Ministry of Finance responsible for managing all state owned banks, financial institutions, and stock exchanges. Md. Ashadul Islam is the head of the division. ==History== Bank and Financial Institutions Division on 8 June 2010 by taking over some of the responsibilities of the Finance Division. ==References== Category:2010 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Government agencies of Bangladesh Category:Government departments of Bangladesh
title: Bank and Financial Institutions Division
